Package com.mackenziehigh.cascade

package com.mackenziehigh.cascade
Cascade - A Micro Actor Framework.
  • Class
    Description
    Cascade
    Micro Actor Framework.
    Cascade.AbstractStage
    Partial Implementation of Stage.
    Cascade.ArrayBlockingQueueMailbox<I>
    A Mailbox implementation based on a ArrayBlockingQueue.
    Cascade.ArrayDequeMailbox<I>
    A Mailbox implementation based on a ArrayDeque.
    Cascade.CircularArrayDequeMailbox<I>
    A Mailbox implementation based on an ArrayDeque, which behaves like a ring-buffer data-structure.
    Cascade.ConcurrentLinkedQueueMailbox<I>
    A Mailbox implementation based on a ConcurrentLinkedQueue.
    Cascade.LinkedBlockingQueueMailbox<I>
    A Mailbox implementation based on a LinkedBlockingQueue.
    Cascade.PriorityBlockingQueueMailbox<I>
    A Mailbox implementation based on a PriorityBlockingQueue.
    Cascade.Stage
    A group of Actors with a common power supply.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor<I,O>
    Actor.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.Builder<I,O>
    Actor Builder.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.ConsumerErrorHandler
    Actor Error Handler.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.ConsumerScript<I>
    Actor Behavior.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.Context<I,O>
    Script Execution Context.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.ContextErrorHandler<I,O>
    Actor Error Handler.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.ContextScript<I,O>
    Actor Behavior.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.FunctionScript<I,O>
    Actor Behavior.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.Input<T>
    Input to an Actor.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.Mailbox<I>
    A queue-like (FIFO) data-structure that stores incoming messages.
    Cascade.Stage.Actor.Output<T>
    Output to an Actor.
